name: Break In Amphibian
description:
When Ferb and Todd, decide to pursue their dreams of having some shiny coins, they must prepare to tackle the heist of their lives: a human bank. Will they be able to get everything they wanted - or will they be caught by the guards and lose it all?

     Break In Amphibian is a casual puzzle game where you, as Ferb and Todd, must bypass security and hack your way into getting the coins from a bank. Inspired by single-player, multiple character games, you must work your way through the puzzles of each room, using the abilities of Todd and Ferb to progress. Hide, hack, and distract your way to success!

Includes:

  • 4 different rooms with puzzles to solve and coins to grab!
  • Room-based checkpoint system to keep your progress while you go.
  • Custom bass and guitar soundtrack to listen to as you play.
  • Comic and Flash inspired graphics and introduction to tell the story of the two amphibians.
